summary: Have you heard of the Drell race ? This mod adds a new follower, Thane Krios, which will meet you in Riverwood\\\'s Tavern. There are 2 other drell lost in the skyrim world, for you to find. This mod is in early alpha. There will be a playable race and quest. Thane comes with amulet of Mara now and can be wed if desired.
descriptionHtml: Have you heard of the Drell race ? This mod adds a new follower, Thane Krios, which will meet you in Riverwood\'s Tavern. There are 2 other drell lost in the skyrim world, for you to find. This mod is in early alpha. There will be a playable race and quest. Thane comes with amulet of Mara now and can be wed if desired.
author: Renmiri Writer
